verses.verse: Thou shalt not raise <S%H5375><s%> a false <S%H7723><s%> report <S%H8088><s%>: put <S%H7896><s%> not thine hand <S%H3027><s%> with the wicked <S%H7563><s%> to be an unrighteous <S%H2555><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%>. raise: or, receive

Thou shalt not follow <S%H310><s%> a multitude <S%H7227><s%> to do evil <S%H7451><s%>; neither shalt thou speak <S%H6030><s%> in a cause <S%H7379><s%> to decline <S%H5186><s%> after <S%H310><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> to wrest <S%H5186><s%> judgment: speak: Heb. answer
Neither shalt thou countenance <S%H1921><s%> a poor <S%H1800><s%> man in his cause <S%H7379><s%>.

If thou meet <S%H6293><s%> thine enemy's <S%H341><s%> ox <S%H7794><s%> or his ass <S%H2543><s%> going astray <S%H8582><s%>, thou shalt surely <S%H7725><s%> bring it back <S%H7725><s%> to him again <S%H7725><s%>.

If thou see <S%H7200><s%> the ass <S%H2543><s%> of him that hateth <S%H8130><s%> thee lying <S%H7257><s%> under his burden <S%H4853><s%>, and wouldest forbear <S%H2308><s%> to help <S%H5800><s%> him, thou shalt surely <S%H5800><s%> help <S%H5800><s%> with him. and: or, wilt thou cease to help him? or, and wouldest cease to leave thy business for him: thou shalt surely leave it to join with him
Thou shalt not wrest <S%H5186><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of thy poor <S%H34><s%> in his cause <S%H7379><s%>.

Keep thee far <S%H7368><s%> from a false <S%H8267><s%> matter <S%H1697><s%>; and the innocent <S%H5355><s%> and righteous <S%H6662><s%> slay <S%H2026><s%> thou not: for I will not justify <S%H6663><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> no gift <S%H7810><s%>: for the gift <S%H7810><s%> blindeth <S%H5786><s%> the wise <S%H6493><s%>, and perverteth <S%H5557><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>. the wise: Heb. the seeing

Also thou shalt not oppress <S%H3905><s%> a stranger <S%H1616><s%>: for ye know <S%H3045><s%> the heart <S%H5315><s%> of a stranger <S%H1616><s%>, seeing <S%H3588><s%> ye were strangers <S%H1616><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>. heart: Heb. soul
And six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> thou shalt sow <S%H2232><s%> thy land <S%H776><s%>, and shalt gather <S%H622><s%> in the fruits <S%H8393><s%> thereof:

But the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year thou shalt let it rest <S%H8058><s%> and lie <S%H5203><s%> still; that the poor <S%H34><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%> may eat <S%H398><s%>: and what they leave <S%H3499><s%> the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%>. In like manner thou shalt deal <S%H6213><s%> with thy vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, and with thy oliveyard <S%H2132><s%>. oliveyard: or, olive trees

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> thy work <S%H4639><s%>, and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt rest <S%H7673><s%>: that thine ox <S%H7794><s%> and thine ass <S%H2543><s%> may rest <S%H5117><s%>, and the son <S%H1121><s%> of thy handmaid <S%H519><s%>, and the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, may be refreshed <S%H5314><s%>.

And in all things that I have said <S%H559><s%> unto you be circumspect <S%H8104><s%>: and make no mention <S%H2142><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, neither let it be heard <S%H8085><s%> out <S%H5921><s%> of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H7272><s%> thou shalt keep a feast <S%H2287><s%> unto me in the year <S%H8141><s%>.

Thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>: (thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, as I commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee, in the time appointed <S%H4150><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib <S%H24><s%>; for in it thou camest out <S%H3318><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and none shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me empty <S%H7387><s%>:)

And the feast <S%H2282><s%> of harvest <S%H7105><s%>, the firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> of thy labours <S%H4639><s%>, which thou hast sown <S%H2232><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>: and the feast <S%H2282><s%> of ingathering <S%H614><s%>, which is in the end <S%H3318><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%>, when thou hast gathered <S%H622><s%> in thy labours <S%H4639><s%> out of the field <S%H7704><s%>.
Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%> all thy males <S%H2138><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H113><s%> GOD <S%H3068><s%>.

Thou shalt not offer <S%H2076><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> with leavened bread <S%H2557><s%>; neither shall the fat <S%H2459><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2282><s%> remain <S%H3885><s%> until the morning <S%H1242><s%>. sacrifice: or, feast

The first <S%H7225><s%> of the firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> of thy land <S%H127><s%> thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>. Thou shalt not seethe <S%H1310><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> in his mother's <S%H517><s%> milk <S%H2461><s%>.

Behold, I send <S%H7971><s%> an Angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, to keep <S%H8104><s%> thee in the way <S%H1870><s%>, and to bring <S%H935><s%> thee into the place <S%H4725><s%> which I have prepared <S%H3559><s%>.

Beware <S%H8104><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> him, and obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, provoke <S%H4843><s%> him not; for he will not pardon <S%H5375><s%> your transgressions <S%H6588><s%>: for my name <S%H8034><s%> is in him <S%H7130><s%>.

But if thou shalt indeed <S%H8085><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> all that I speak <S%H1696><s%>; then I will be an enemy <S%H340><s%> unto thine enemies <S%H341><s%>, and an adversary <S%H6887><s%> unto thine adversaries <S%H6696><s%>. an adversary: or, I will afflict them that afflict thee

For mine Angel <S%H4397><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, and bring <S%H935><s%> thee in unto the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>, and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, the Hivites <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%>: and I will cut them off <S%H3582><s%>.

Thou shalt not bow down <S%H7812><s%> to their gods <S%H430><s%>, nor serve <S%H5647><s%> them, nor do <S%H6213><s%> after their works <S%H4639><s%>: but thou shalt utterly <S%H2040><s%> overthrow <S%H2040><s%> them, and quite <S%H7665><s%> break down <S%H7665><s%> their images <S%H4676><s%>.

And ye shall serve <S%H5647><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and he shall bless <S%H1288><s%> thy bread <S%H3899><s%>, and thy water <S%H4325><s%>; and I will take <S%H5493><s%> sickness <S%H4245><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> from the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee.
There shall nothing cast their young <S%H7921><s%>, nor be barren <S%H6135><s%>, in thy land <S%H776><s%>: the number <S%H4557><s%> of thy days <S%H3117><s%> I will fulfil <S%H4390><s%>.

I will send <S%H7971><s%> my fear <S%H367><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, and will destroy <S%H2000><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> to whom thou shalt come <S%H935><s%>, and I will make <S%H5414><s%> all thine enemies <S%H341><s%> turn their backs <S%H6203><s%> unto thee. backs: Heb. neck

And I will send <S%H7971><s%> hornets <S%H6880><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, which shall drive out <S%H1644><s%> the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, from before <S%H6440><s%> thee.

I will not drive them out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee in one <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>; lest the land <S%H776><s%> become desolate <S%H8077><s%>, and the beast <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> multiply <S%H7227><s%> against thee.

By little <S%H4592><s%> and little <S%H4592><s%> I will drive them out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee, until thou be increased <S%H6509><s%>, and inherit <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

And I will set <S%H7896><s%> thy bounds <S%H1366><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> even unto the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and from the desert <S%H4057><s%> unto the river <S%H5104><s%>: for I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> into your hand <S%H3027><s%>; and thou shalt drive them out <S%H1644><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee.
Thou shalt make <S%H3772><s%> no covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, nor with their gods <S%H430><s%>.

They shall not dwell <S%H3427><s%> in thy land <S%H776><s%>, lest they make thee sin <S%H2398><s%> against me: for if thou serve <S%H5647><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%>, it will surely be a snare <S%H4170><s%> unto thee.
